1140590.name: Pizza Game (Original Soundtrack)
1140590.description:
Download the music of Pizza Game and listen on the go! Pizza Game (Original Soundtrack) features 41 cool tunes, boppin' jams, and sweet pickles from smash hit* visual novel Pizza Game, writted by Plasterbrain.

*"Smash hit" is premature optimism; game may actually sell horribly and Plaster will die alone and unloved by the masses

This soundtrack does not contain the dumb loading/gameover jingles or the two public domain tracks used in Pizza Game.
1140590.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
